attributes.action: ask for the honourable dupa2beri to be made a knight
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Knighthood as known in Europe is characterized by two elements, spirit and (un)reliability as a mounted combatant. Dupa2beri,more than any others, should receive the title. I shall not go on further to list the qualities he posses, as it will be an unnecessary offense.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
